testcase.classname: API01 Verify account and customer pairs and transaction
testcase.name: TC0101API Account verify
testcase.system-out: Given Use API1 endpoint "http://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/services/bank/accounts/13566".passed And Get all the information of accounts of the customer.....................passed And Assert API1 the status code is 200......................................passed Then Assert customerId is "12434"...........................................passed

testcase.classname: API01 Verify account and customer pairs and transaction
testcase.name: TC0102API Transaction verify
testcase.system-out: Given Use API2 endpoint "http://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/services/bank/accounts/13566/transactions".passed And Get all the transactions of the customer................................passed And Assert API2 the status code is 200......................................passed And Verify the number of transaction as 3...................................passed And verify the first id of transaction is 14476.............................passed Then verify the amount of third transaction is "500.0"......................passed
